@ RMJ13

You are stupid. The retail version requires steam, therefore the version you download and the version you buy at retail are one and the same.

@Deathstryker

The version you download and the version you buy at retail are not the same at all.

@ superj1977

The installation method is different but the content afterwards is not.

dudes, just a hint.

I got over the "windows won't run the executable file" whatever.. problem.
Just install Physx.

I have an ATI so it made no sense to me, but I figured what the hell. 
And voila.

And the net is full with "there's no solution to that problem" BS.

Don't overthink it. Give it a shot.
